long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab experience with TreeLapse Tab, blending art, nature, and time tracking.

Features:
• Dynamic tree artwork generated for each new tab
• Customizable time tracker showing elapsed time since your chosen date
• Personalized message display
• Responsive design that adapts to any screen size
• One-click refresh for new artwork

Perfect for tracking long-term goals, remembering important dates, or adding a touch of nature to your browsing. TreeLapse Tab turns every new tab into a moment of inspiration and reflection.

Embrace the passage of time with beauty and creativity. Install TreeLapse Tab today!
